residency_requirement: 1,095 days of residence in Canada within the four years preceding their application
application_details: appellant accumulated only 357 days of residence in Canada during the required period while studying abroad
decision_reasoning: failure to meet the statutory residency requirement due to prolonged absence from Canada for study

result_of_case: Appeal dismissed; appellant must fulfill residency requirement before reapplying
